00042 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00043 class AbstractMeshWriter
00044 {
00045 protected: // Give access of these members to subclasses
00046 
00047     OutputFileHandler* mpOutputFileHandler; 
00048     std::string mBaseName; 
00050     std::vector< std::vector<unsigned> > mBoundaryFaceData; 
00052     AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* mpMeshReader; 
00054     unsigned mNumNodes; 
00055     unsigned mNumElements; 
00057 public:
00058 
00066     AbstractMeshWriter(const std::string& rDirectory,
00067                        const std::string& rBaseName,
00068                        const bool clearOutputDir=true);
00069 
00073     virtual ~AbstractMeshWriter();
00074 
00078     std::string GetOutputDirectory();
00079 
00083     virtual unsigned GetNumNodes();
00084 
00088     unsigned GetNumElements();
00089 
00093     unsigned GetNumBoundaryFaces();
00094 
00098     unsigned GetNumBoundaryEdges();
00099 
00103     virtual std::vector<double> GetNextNode();
00104 
00105 
00109     virtual ElementData GetNextElement();
00110 
00111 
00117     void SetNextBoundaryFace(std::vector<unsigned> nextFace);
00118 
00123     virtual void WriteFiles()=0;
00124 
00130     void WriteFilesUsingMeshReader(AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>& rMeshReader);
00131 
00132 };
